name: Adele
description: Adele Laurie Blue Adkins is a British singer-songwriter known for her powerful and soulful voice. She rose to fame with her debut album '19' and has since become one of the world's best-selling music artists.

name: Beyoncé
description: Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter is an American singer, songwriter, and actress. She gained fame as the lead singer of Destiny's Child and has since established herself as a solo artist and global icon known for her powerful performances and advocacy.

name: Ed Sheeran
description: Ed Sheeran is an English singer-songwriter known for his heartfelt lyrics and acoustic-driven pop songs. He gained worldwide recognition with hits like 'Shape of You' and 'Thinking Out Loud.'

name: Rihanna
description: Rihanna, born Robyn Rihanna Fenty, is a Barbadian singer, actress, and businesswoman. She is known for her versatile music style and has achieved numerous chart-topping hits and awards.

name: Drake
description: Aubrey Drake Graham, known professionally as Drake, is a Canadian rapper, singer, and actor. He is one of the best-selling music artists globally and has a diverse catalog of hits.

name: Taylor Swift
description: Taylor Swift is an American singer-songwriter known for her storytelling through music. She has transitioned from country to pop and is known for chart-topping albums like '1989' and 'Fearless.'

name: Justin Bieber
description: Justin Bieber is a Canadian singer and songwriter who gained fame as a teenager. He has a massive fan following and has released several successful albums and hit singles.

name: Billie Eilish
description: Billie Eilish Pirate Baird O'Connell is an American singer-songwriter known for her unique style and hauntingly beautiful music. She gained fame with her debut single 'Ocean Eyes' and has since won multiple Grammy Awards.

name: The Weeknd
description: The Weeknd, born Abel Tesfaye, is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and record producer. He is known for his dark and atmospheric music and has achieved critical acclaim and commercial success.
